query: Billy is volunteering his time to help people do their taxes. He can help 6907437 people per hour for 3 hours a day. If he takes 69074370% of the days between March 1st and April 19th off, and helps people on all the other days. How many people does he help? (Remember there are 31 days in March.)

Thus, Billy helps 0 people during this period.
